name: One Bullet to Victory
description:
What can you do with only one bullet?



One Bullet to Victory is a one bullet vertical shooter.
You can only use one bullet to shoot down your target.

Major Features:

  • Unique Gameplay with Simple Retro Graphics
  • Various Enemies and Boss Battles
  • Password System for State Saving
  • Achievement System
  • ...and only one bullet


System Requirements (PC):

  • OS: Windows 7 32-bit
  • CPU: 1GHz Dual-Core
  • Memory: 2GB
  • Graphics Card: Supports 1280*720 screen resolution


We don't guarantee that our game will run with a lower system environment.

Version History:

  • 1.3 Update(2014.12.01): Hard mode added.
  • 1.4 Update(2014.12.07): Bug Fix: Game won't crash anymore when final boss stage.
  • No further plan to update other than android porting. this project is dead. thank you everyone.

Other Information:

  • This is a single player game.
  • Currently, we don't support game controllers.
